Translations.Text: O ludia jestn zem products all bol lawful dobry nie nasledovat steps Satan; he bol tvoj zapalisty enemy
He len commands ona commit zly zverak say GOD co ona nie zauzlit
When they told Nasledovat co GOD revealed tu they say My nasledovat len co my zalozit our rodicia Co ich rodicia has robit. nie chapat nie guided
Vzor such disbelievers bol lenze z parrots repeat co they hear zdravy vola sa chapat Deaf dumb blind they nie chapat
O ona verit jestn dobry things my zadovazit for ona bol thankful do GOD ona kult Him alone

(He len zakazat for ona jestn zviera umrel z themselves human interference) blood meat pigs zviera dedicated do inak than GOD 1 forced jestn these) without je zlomyselny zamerny he nie incurs zhresit! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Those zatajit GOD's revelations scripture lacny latka zisk jestn zapalit ich brucho. GOD will NIE speak do them DNI VZKRIESENIE nor will He purify them! They incurred painful retribution
bol they zvolit si straying guidance retribution forgiveness! Consequently they endure Hell
This je GOD revealed this scripture bearing truth those dispute scripture bol the vela zapalisty opponents
